metadata.title: CVE-2023-49555 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in YASM 1.3.0.86.g9def allows a remote attacker to cause a denialof service via the expand_smacro function in themodules/preprocs/nasm/nasm-pp.c component.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
